product_name: ProRack Frame Mount Roof Top Bike Carrier
long_description: You'll be in the saddle sooner with the ProRack Frame Mount Roof Top bike carrier. It conveniently transports your bike without the hassle of removing a wheel. Fits a wide variety of bicycle down tube shapes and sizes between 1 - 3 in. in diameter; disc brake and thru axle compatible; locking jaws fold down when not in use. Universal attachment hardware fits round bars, square bars, aero bars and most factory-installed racks. Rack is rated to carry 1 bike weighing up to 30 lbs.
short_description: You'll be in the saddle sooner with the ProRack Frame Mount Roof Top bike carrier. It conveniently transports your bike without the hassle of removing a wheel.
